mapper.insert: insert into users( login, status, token, ip, port ) values ( #{user.login}, #{user.status}, #{user.token}, #{user.ip}, #{user.port} )
mapper.select: select id, login, status, token, ip, port from users where login = #{login}
mapper.update: update users set login = #{user.login}, status = #{user.status}, token = #{user.token}, ip = #{user.ip}, port = #{user.port}, where id = #{user.id}
